front.title: •4-LOM With Concussion Rifle
front.gametext: Adds one battle destiny if with Jabba or Zuckuss. Permanent weapon is •4-LOM's Concussion Rifle (may target a character for free; target may not use its game text for remainder of turn).
front.lore: Accomplished thief and information broker. Modified by Jabba to be an effective bounty hunter. The Hutt often teams 4-LOM with other hired killers.

combo: 4-LOM With Concussion Rifle + E Chu Ta Cancel game text of two opponent's characters in same turn.
4-LOM With Concussion Rifle + Zuckuss In Mist Hunter Two battle destinies.
4-LOM With Concussion Rifle + Boba Fett, Bounty Hunter Two battle destinies.
